testcase.classname: F01_Registration | user register to e-commerce website
testcase.name: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to register page............................................passed When user enters valid data.................................................passed And user click on register option...........................................passed Then user should register successfully......................................passed And registration completion message should appear...........................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | user login to e-commerce website
testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed When user enters "aessam@gmail.com" and "123456"............................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user should be login successfully......................................passed And user go to the home page................................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | user login to e-commerce website
testcase.name: User should not log in with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: When user enters "ali@gmail.com" and "wrongPassword"........................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user should not login successfully.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Password Reset | user reset password
testcase.name: User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to login page...............................................passed And user click on forgot password...........................................passed When user enters his registered email.......................................passed And press on Recover button.................................................passed Then user should reset his password successfully............................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Product Search | user search for product
testcase.name: Logged user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: When user click on search box and write "book"..............................passed And user press on the search button.........................................passed Then "book" should appear successfully......................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Product Search | user search for product
testcase.name: Logged user could search using product name 2
testcase.system-out: When user click on search box and write "laptop"............................passed And user press on the search button.........................................passed Then "laptop" should appear successfully....................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Product Search | user search for product
testcase.name: Logged user could search using product name 3
testcase.system-out: When user click on search box and write "nike"..............................passed And user press on the search button.........................................passed Then "nike" should appear successfully......................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Product Search | user search for product
testcase.name: Logged user could search for product using sku
testcase.system-out: When user click on search box and write "SCI_FAITH".........................passed And user press on the search button.........................................passed And user click on the product in search result..............................passed Then "SCI_FAITH" should appear successfully in product page.................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Product Search | user search for product
testcase.name: Logged user could search for product using sku 2
testcase.system-out: When user click on search box and write "APPLE_CAM".........................passed And user press on the search button.........................................passed And user click on the product in search result..............................passed Then "APPLE_CAM" should appear successfully in product page.................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Product Search | user search for product
testcase.name: Logged user could search for product using sku 3
testcase.system-out: When user click on search box and write "SF_PRO_11".........................passed And user press on the search button.........................................passed And user click on the product in search result..............................passed Then "SF_PRO_11" should appear successfully in product page.................passed

testcase.classname: F05_Switching Currencies | user switch between US and Euro currencies
testcase.name: Logged User could choose US currency
testcase.system-out: When user click on the currency selector and choose the US currency.........passed Then US dollar symbol is chosen and displayed on all products...............passed

testcase.classname: F05_Switching Currencies | user switch between US and Euro currencies
testcase.name: Logged User could choose Euro currency
testcase.system-out: When user click on the currency selector and choose the Euro currency.......passed Then Euro symbol is chosen and displayed on all products....................passed

testcase.classname: F06_Hover On Categories | user hover on categories
testcase.name: Logged user could hover on different sub categories
testcase.system-out: When user select random one of the three main categories....................passed Then user could hover on sub categories of the selected main category.......passed

testcase.classname: F07_Home Sliders | user clicks on home sliders
testcase.name: first slider is clickable on home page
testcase.failure:
When user clicks on the Nokia Lumia 1020 slider.............................passed Then user should be directed to Nokia Lumia 1020 page.......................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/iphone-6] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:110) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:1413) at org.testng.Assert.assertEqualsImpl(Assert.java:149) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:131) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:655) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:665) at org.example.Step_Definitions.D07_HomeSliders_StepDefinitions.iphone_Page(D07_HomeSliders_StepDefinitions.java:40) at ✽.user should be directed to Nokia Lumia 1020 page(file:///D:/E-Commerce%20Website%20Project/E-Commerce_Website_Testing/src/main/resources/Features_Folder/F07_Home_Sliders.feature:7)

testcase.classname: F07_Home Sliders | user clicks on home sliders
testcase.name: second slider is clickable on home page
testcase.failure:
When user clicks on the iPhone slider.......................................passed Then user should be directed to iPhone page.................................failed
